tool_description: Loads and standardizes inventory data from various sources including CSV files, databases, and APIs, ensuring data consistency for downstream analysis.

data_source_path.description: Path to the inventory data source (file path, database connection string, or API endpoint)

data_format.description: Format of the data source (csv, json, database, api)

date_range_start.description: Start date for data filtering in ISO 8601 format

date_range_end.description: End date for data filtering in ISO 8601 format

error_messages: Invalid data source path: Ensure the file path, database connection, or API endpoint is accessible and correctly formatted.
Unsupported data format: Use one of [csv, json, database, api].
Invalid date range: Ensure start date is before end date and both are in valid ISO 8601 format.
Data parsing error: Check that the data source contains required columns (item_id, quantity, unit_cost, transaction_date).
usage: Provide data_source_path and data_format. Optionally filter by date range. The tool standardizes and validates inventory data for further processing.

records_loaded.description: Number of inventory records successfully loaded

data_summary.description: Summary of loaded data including date ranges and item count

validation_status.description: Status of data validation (passed, warnings, errors)
